beer.name: Double Dead Guy Ale
beer.description: Deep amber copper color. Buttery peanut brittle, orange blossom tea aromas follow through to a rich chewy and fruity full body with nice notes of caramel drizzled dried apricot and roasted grains and spice. Finishes with a long, tangy grilled grapefruit and chocolate fade.
beer.yeast: Rogue's Pacman Yeast and Free Range Coastal Water.
